name: Open-source-machine-learning-degree
tagline: Learn machine learning for free, because free is better than not-free.
body: # open-source-machine-learning-degree Learn machine learning for free, because free is better than not-free. ###Calculus Calculus by Gilbert Strang pdf ###Proofs "How to Prove It" by Daniel J. Velleman pdf ###Linear Algebra Linear Algebra by Jim Hefferon pdf ###More Linear Algebra "Linear Algebra Done Right" by Sheldon Axler pdf "Advanced Linear Algebra" by Steven Roman pdf "Advanced Linear Algebra" by Bruce E. Shapiro pdf ###Even More Damn Linear Algebra "A Collection of Notes on Numerical Linear Algebra" by pdf (optional donation to the author on his website) There are very few free numerical linear algebra resources available online. ###Probability and Statistics "Introduction to Probability" by Charles M. Grinstead pdf "All of Statistics" by Larry Wasserman pdf ###Introductory Machine Learning "Introduction to Machine Learning" by Alex Smola and S.V.N. Vishwanathan pdf "Introduction to Machine Learning" by Ethem Alpaydin pdf ###Computer Vision Computer Vision: Algorithms and Applications pdf ###Reinforcement Learning "Introduction to Reinforcement Learning" by Sutton and Barto html ###Applied Machine Learning "Machine Learning in Action" by Peter Harrington pdf "Introduction to Statistical Learning" by Hastie et al. pdf ###MACHINE LEARNING - HARD MODE "Elements of Statistical Learning" by Hastie et al. pdf "Bayesian Reasoning and Machine Learning" by David Barber pdf "Pattern Recognition and Machine Learning" by Christopher M. Bishop pdf
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
